title: (x) Pocatello Cycle logo serif face - Accolade {Steven Wulf}
content:
I am having a hard time figuring these two fonts out. Both the Pocatello Cycle and Pocatello Idaho fonts.

any help would be greatly appreciated.

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20081203193150im_/http:/www.typophile.com/files/pocatello_3500.jpg)

 [‹ (x) London Fashion Week heavy blocky sans caps - (similar to) OL Smokler Bold {Akira}](http://web.archive.org/web/20081203193150/http:/www.typophile.com/node/38800 "Go to previous forum topic") [(x) Grafik Magazine geometric sans - ITC Avant Garde Gothic {Jamesy Love} ›](http://web.archive.org/web/20081203193150/http:/www.typophile.com/node/35887 "Go to next forum topic")
author: vector

comments.content: My guess is that there is one font used here. It’s [artificially bolded](http://web.archive.org/web/20081203193150/http:/www.typophile.com/wiki/faux%252Bformatting) on the bottom.

Both fonts are the same.

Accolade:  
 [http://www.linotype.com/175607/cgaccolade-family.html](http://web.archive.org/web/20081203193150/http:/www.linotype.com/175607/cgaccolade-family.html "http://www.linotype.com/175607/cgaccolade-family.html")
Thank you, that’s it. Much appreciated
